## ‚úÖ Template Quality Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] Template has been used successfully in real projects
- [ ] All example data uses placeholders (no real/sensitive information)
- [ ] Professional formatting and presentation
- [ ] Clear instructions for use included
- [ ] Customization guidance provided

### Technical Quality
- [ ] Template opens correctly in target software
- [ ] All formulas/macros function properly (if applicable)
- [ ] Compatible with commonly used software versions
- [ ] No broken links or references
- [ ] Follows repository naming conventions

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md file included with usage instructions
- [ ] Examples or case studies provided
- [ ] Integration notes with other templates (if applicable)
- [ ] Success metrics or validation criteria included

## üìÅ Files to Include

**Core Template Files:**
- [ ] Main template file (.docx, .xlsx, .pptx)
- [ ] README.md with instructions
- [ ] Completed example (with anonymized data)

**Optional Files:**
- [ ] Multiple format versions
- [ ] Customization guide
- [ ] Integration instructions
- [ ] Related templates or tools

- [ ] All features function correctly
- [ ] No error messages or warnings

**User Testing:**
- [ ] Used by someone other than creator
- [ ] Feedback collected and incorporated
- [ ] Instructions validated for clarity
